overview: With over 20+ years of experience spanning mobile, gaming, e-commerce and digital content markets, Tammy currently manages gBox Inc as CEO. Prior to gBox, Tammy was COO of Navio Systems where she managed Navio’s day to day operations. During her tenure at Navio Tammy also held positions of SVP Sales & Products and VP Engineering. Prior to Navio Tammy was VP of Sales and Operations at mobile content and gaming publisher Kayak Interactive, where Tammy launched their North and South American distribution channels by securing direct carrier relationships with major top tier mobile service providers. Prior to Kayak, Tammy wasVP of Sales at Sorrent (now Glu Mobile), where she grew the company to one of the top three mobile game publishers. Tammy has also held executive sales, operations, marketing and product management positions at Intershop Communications, XMarc, Inc., Peakstone and Wind River Systems. Tammy received B.S. and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from Stanford University.
